attributes.action: London Taxis(Black Cabs) to have to have parity with London Buses using all bus lanes
attributes.additional_details:
London Taxis( Black Cabs) should be able to use all lanes and priveledges allowed to London Buses.To enable taxis to be hailed as best in the world, we have to transport our clients as quickly and cost effectively as possible. Let cabs for example use London Bridge bus lane, or the bus lane into Arthur st. E.C.4., There are many other examples.
I thank you.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Greater London Authority and the Mayor.
